q: The new governor and the Congressional delegation said they see an opportunity to use William Hsiao 's recommendations and the requirements and financial support of the federal health care law to make big changes in Vermont. If the Vermont state Legislature, governor and the delegation are able to work together effectively, Bernie Sanders said,`` we have a golden opportunity not only to significantly improve the heatlh care system in Vermont, but to lead the entire nation in a very new and better direction.''`` Our

Union speech. Democratic Sen. Patrick Leahy sat in a bipartisan group with Republicans from Alabama, Kansas, and Wyoming. He said the president sounded less like a professor and more like a statesman. Governing and budgeting are about choices and priorities, and I agree with the president that our budget focus needs to be on what makes America stronger, Patrick Leahy said in a written statement. creator Simon Cowell also revealed that the American X Factor would be open to contestants as young as 12 years old. Unlike American Idol, the competition is open to vocal groups as well as solo singers. I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract, Simon Cowell said in a press release.
